public class EditFilm extends Object implements Command
Implementation of the Command interface for editing film information.

    • getFilm

      private Film getFilm(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws jakarta.servlet.ServletException, IOException
      Extracts film information from the request.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP servlet request.
      Returns:
      The film object with extracted information.
      Throws:
